Package com.cscie97.store.controller

Class StoreControllerService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cscie97.store.controller.StoreControllerService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IObserver
    public class StoreControllerService
extends java.lang.Object
implements IObserver
    This class is a concrete observer that knows about the state of the Store Model Service when it changes. This class also orchestrates actions based on the changes
    Author:
    Tofik Mussa
